text: Thomas Coleman Lowry (17 February 1898 in Fernhill â€“ 20 July 1976 in Hastings) He was a New Zealand cricketer who captained the first seven tests in 1930 and 1931 and also played first class cricket from 1918 to 1937. ==Other websites== * Category:1898 births Category:1976 deaths Category:New Zealand cricketers
title: Tom Lowry
